text: Cheese Shop can refer to: *A retailing establishment that sells cheese *The Cheese Shop, Louth, an Artisan Delicatessen based in Louth, Lincolnshire *The Cheese Store of Beverly Hills, a Gourmet foods store in Beverly Hills, California *The Cheese Shop sketch from the TV comedy show Monty Python *The Cheese Shop, a British comedy writing and performing team * The Cheese Shop, a popular magazine-style radio comedy show broadcast initially on 3PBS and then 3RRR in Melbourne, Australia and hosted by Dave Taranto and co-hosted from 1993 to 1999 by Janet A McLeod * The Python Package Index (abbreviated as PyPI), formerly known as the Python Cheese Shop
title: Cheese Shop
